main event: A student reported sighting a star-like object with a domed object above it in Athens, Ohio in April 1969.
interesting points: The sighting involved two observations of the phenomenon, one at about 2000 and the other at about 2110., The star-like object was described as light and self-luminous in red and yellow colors., The student initially reported the sighting as a UFO but later indicated it was a hoax., The phenomena was noted to stand still at times and disappear on the eastern horizon., No physical evidence or photographs were associated with the sighting.
sighted object: one star-like main object and one domed object
